text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    444256004American Joint Commission on Cancer, Cancer Staging Manual, 6th edition neoplasm staging system (tumor staging)
    443830009American Joint Commission on Cancer, Cancer Staging Manual, 7th edition neoplasm staging system (tumor staging)
    897275008American Joint Commission on Cancer, Cancer Staging Manual, 8th edition neoplasm staging system (tumor staging)
    1269566009American Joint Commission on Cancer, Cancer Staging Manual, 9th version neoplasm staging system (tumor staging)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/mcode/CodeSystem/snomed-requested-cs
    CodeDisplay
    USCRS-34955UICC Classification of Malignant Tumours 8th Edition (tumor staging)
    USCRS-34956UICC Classification of Malignant Tumours 7th Edition (tumor staging)

name: TNMStagingMethodVS
title: TNM Staging Method Value Set
description: Staging method used for AJCC TNM staging, e.g., AJCC 8th edition, UICC 7th edition, etc.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
